summary: The new school year starts off terrible for Kim. In her ordinary life her best friend is moving away, and in her heroic crime-fighting life, three of the most notorious villains in her world plan to use time travel as a weapon against her.
cast: Christy Carlson Romano|Will Friedle|Nancy Cartwright|Tahj Mowry|Gary Cole|John DiMaggio|Michael Dorn|Michael Clarke Duncan|Harrison Fahn|Dakota Fanning|Shaun Fleming|Vivica A. Fox|Brian George|Richard Gilliland|Elliott Gould|Tom Kane|Andrea Martin|Freddie Prinze Jr.|Raven-Symoné|Kelly Ripa|Jean Smart|Kath Soucie|Kirsten Storms|Nicole Sullivan
title: Kim Possible: Problemas en el tiempo
